word:
There have been mistakes made in not seeking to reach the higher classes. There have been mistakes made in not seeking to reach the ministers, opening the truth to them. There is a large work to be done, and how few have any sense of it. We must wake up, we must work from a higher standpoint.--Letter 


                                    -118- 

44, 1887, pp. 2, 3. (To the board of the Pacific Publishing House, April 19, 1887.) 

Released December 1968.
